Package mvc.secondCalc.model

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvc.secondCalc.model.Input
  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    Class in which the input strings are managed to be in an appropriate form to be computed and displayed on the screen.
    Author:
    Rafal

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String actualNumber
      Actual number that can be modified by a user.
      private java.lang.Boolean clear
      Flag communicating whether it is the beginning of the new equation.
      private java.lang.String equation
      Whole equation with signs, that cannot be modified by a user.
      private java.lang.Boolean newNumber
      Flag communicating whether it is a new number.
